title: Game Maker 7.0 With Working Crack
description:
1.  Run Game Maker 7.0.exe. 
2.  Install Game Maker 7.0 where ever you please
3.  After, Run the Crack.exe file.
4.  Choose the directory that you installed Game Maker 7.0 onto, then press Kill Him

Thats it! You have successfully nstalled Game Maker 7.0! Wasnt that hard??



Go to YoYoGames.com. This is where you can sign up for free, then upload all of your 
games you create onto. You can also play other people games that they have created on
Game Maker. 



Also, I put all of the examples/tutorials in here as well. This is very helpfull for 
beginners as well as advanced users. 


Tutorials:
Creating Your Very First Game!!!!!
First person Shoter
Maze Games
Multiplayer (Online)
Scrolling shooter
Adding Depth (Whatever that is lol)

Have fun creating your games! 


Cheerios!
